name: Amelia Blackwood
text: Southern Realty & Property Management, LLC.... Actually.

name: Just 1 Man
text: Avoid.  One of the biggest scam artist I know I met in this building

name: Ruben Pearson
text: Great place to work at.

name: Litha P
text: Always learn something new when I go. This time this young lady was selling clothes upstairs. Very friendly and professional.

name: ROKK STAR
text: Nice

name: Sara Caldwell
text: We have rented office space from Chris and his company for about 4 years now and have been very happy. He is very responsive and professional whenever we have an issue and he definitely treats us more like friends that tenants. I would definitely rent from him again and suggest that others do so as well!

name: Jenah Haynes
text: Chris and his team go above and beyond to take care of their customers. Our transition into Auburn would have been significantly more difficult without Chris. Not only was he committed to helping us find a location for our business, but he genuinely cared about seeing our business successful. Throughout the last three years he has been quite the friend to us and we cannot imagine doing business with anyone else.

name: Louie Arvelo
text: Mr. Koullas has been a fantastic landlord for our engineering firm.  He has in our infancy years introduced our senior engineers to folks in  the community to assist us in making our business grow.  In regards in maintaining our office space, any issue is taken care of immediately!  His and staff are true professionals!

name: John Hudon
text: Koullas properties is a delight with whom to work. The staff is professional and they are genuinely interested in their clients as individuals. A family approach to business is expressed in a similar feel as a business partner.  Highly Recommended!

name: Auburn Pain
text: I have just recently met Chris Koullas, but it has always been very pleasant and helpful interaction. He is prompt with assisting in any issues that may arise.

name: Marian Moesinger
text: Very friendly place. Wonderful animals here.

name: Mr Mane
text: A beautiful building right in the middle of downtown the couple of photos are the view from the 25th floor. The 25th floor is corporate security offices and training I was there for training so I will give it three stars just because of the beauty of the building and some of the very large expensive tables that they have in this building.

name: Harrison C. Davies
text: This is a really cool coastal landmark and has some very rich history not to mention some unique records. Interior and exterior have a modern yet classy feel and it’s a great icon for Mobile and the state of Alabama as a whole! #mobile #alabama #battlehousetower #skyscrapper #interstate10 #gulfcoast

name: Deedee Webb
text: This was a great experience!!! Vinita and Erica, were wonderful, so helpful...They took wonderful care of our group.  We were at Regis for about 2 months the offices and restrooms were always very clean. Their security procedures made you feel that your work area was very safe.  I would recommend Regis to anyone that needs space for their business

name: Doctor Pepper
text: Awesome view and a great customer service

name: Roberto Singleton
text: Great customer service, and the view is amazing! They are located in the tallest building in Alabama.

name: Amber Adams
text: Wonderful

name: David Miller
text: Older office building but great views of the lakes.

name: Jerry Vazquez
text: Ok

name: David Hunter
text: Great staff here!  It's an older building, but some offices have great views of downtown.  I love to chat with the staff on my way in to work.  They are so friendly and helpful.  The best place to park imo is in the deck.

name: christi mullins
text: Very clean, great meeting rooms, and super good food

name: Terry Hopson
text: Happy New Year y'all did good

name: Angela Hollis
text: Great place to host an event

name: Shanequa Moore
text: Very Nice

name: D Lee
text: Awesome co-working space!  A very professional and peaceful environment where I am able to be so much more productive than staying at home or in my car.   Warm and friendly staff.  I am so glad I found Mid-Towne Works!

name: reese Dismukes
text: Awesome people and great space! I have had my permanent office here for almost a year now, and don't think I could have found a more equipped place for everything I need to do business. Mid-Towne Works made it possible for Palomar Insurance and my self to get our Mobile foot print established!

name: Ben Brenner
text:
Mid-Towne Works is a fantastic co-working space. After deciding there were too many distractions working from home, I visited all the local co-working spaces. While they all have their own advantages, I chose Mid-Towne Works due to its proximity to my house, the free parking, the fantastic amenities, and their overall value.

The space is absolutely beautiful, and the staff is incredibly friendly and are quick to step in when I need help. They were even quick to install hooks outside when I told them I'd like to start commuting on my bicycle.

I really like how quiet the office is. The coffee bar and fridge with cold drinks are always well stocked. I've definitely noticed an uptick in productivity since I started working from Mid-Towne Works and highly recommend anyone who works from home to give them a try.

name: Teri Easterling
text: Our daughter selected Venue 3131 for her wedding and reception. From setting the date in June 2020 through the wedding day 6/26/21 the staff has been responsive and helpful. They enjoy what they do and do it well. The setting is lovely and versatile. The chapel is air conditioned. The studio opens up, and strategically placed fans kept us comfortable as the sun went down. They give access to a room full of decorations. Daughter opted to leave some of hers, so the staff handled take down for us. Rehearsal dinner set up was in the arbor terrace that was quite pleasant. Chris and Holly and crew are excellent! I have attended some other events there that were well done also.

resp.text:
Hi Teri, thanks for posting some photos from your daughters wedding.  We were fortunate to be able to work with her and Tyler and this wedding was so fun and unique!  WE LOVED IT!

We are thankful that we have very responsive, and accommodating staff that always go above and beyond. We hope to see you again at more events in the future!

name: Regina Williams
text: A hidden jewel for weddings...

resp.text: Thanks for taking the time to leave us a review and post some pictures.  We are so glad we were able to host everyone, and the WEDDING WAS STUNNING!  We hope to see you again at events in the future.

name: DJ Mason Music
text: Venue 31|31 is an amazing venue and perfect for hosting your big day! The venue has a great layout for intimate weddings with lots of natural appeal that’s ideal for perfect photos! Your guests will be in aww the moment they walk into your event!

resp.text: Thanks guys!  It was great having you out to DJ!  We can't wait to see you all again out at the Venue!

name: Courtney Nolan
text: Venue 3131 is amazing!!!!! We had our wedding here a few weeks ago and all I can say is wow! Chris and Holly were great to work with and helped us so much throughout the planning process! We had different venue booked but they canceled on us with 2 months to spare. We came across Venue 3131 and they swooped right in and saved the day! I keep saying that we ended up way better off in the end. Every staff member was so attentive and caring and the venue is truly beautiful. Our wedding weekend was absolute pure magic from rehearsal dinner to send off. We can’t thank Chris, Holly, and staff enough! Seriously if you’re needing a venue for any event Venue 3131 is the place to go!

resp.text: Hi Courtney, we are so glad that our paths crossed!  Although it was in tough circumstances with last minute changes from your prior wedding venue.   We are glad we were able to (save the day- literally) and accommodate you and Michael.  We hope that we were able to help make your wedding even better than you had imagined!  Thanks again for the review and we hope to see you two again in the future!

name: Paul Iwanaga
text: Very friendly and helpful staff. Cute little wedding venue.

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to take photos, and post them, we really appreciate you.  We had a blast at Matt and Melody's Rehearsal dinner and wedding, and look forward to out next event with them.  Enjoy your time here in Birmingham and safe travels back home.  Thanks again for the review.

name: david nelson
text: Attended a wedding at venue 3131, very elegant venue. Nice chapel, very peaceful courtyard with fountain, and several other beautiful areas to just walk/stroll through and enjoy the ambience! Didn't even know this place existed right in the middle of Hueytown. The staff was very courteous and helpful!! Should a woman ever actually decide to marry me, I'll be calling venue 3131

name: fun music mix creativeingenuity
text: Amazing Wedding and event venue with multiple event or wedding sites and amazing service.

resp.text: Thanks for letting others know about your experience with VENUE 31|31.  Your support goes a long way in helping us grow our new business.  Be safe, and we hope to see you again soon.

name: denean smith
text: Chris and his staff are the absolute best! The venue is beautiful as well.

name: Debbie Kiker
text: The Venue is not only beautiful ..the staff and owners are awesome!

name: Steve Green
text: Staff was very nice and incredibly helpful. The experience was awesome

resp.text: Steve it was our privilege to help celebrate with everyone!  Everyone seemed to have an amazing and fun time, and we are thankful to have been a part in the celebrations!  We look forward to seeing you again in the future.

name: cammiecca miller
text: I hade my party there and everyone was nice, the staff was amazing and the place was beautiful.

name: Yancy Morgan
text: Love it great place to have a wedding

name: ETHEL Crowder
text: Beautiful decor, good experience

name: Richard Roddy
text: Beautiful place and the staff is amazing!

name: Skip McConnell
text: It was a nice clean and refreshing place.I would definitely use again  and recommend to others.Thanks Chris and Holly.Good job!!

resp.text:
Thanks Skip, Austin and Angel's wedding was PERFECT!  I am glad you all had a good time!
Thanks you,
Chris and Holly
VENUE 31|31

name: Cheri Harwood
text: What a beautiful venue!

name: Bill Green
text: Great place and good food!

resp.text: Bill, thank you for the kind words. We are grateful for people taking the time to let others know about their experiences at Venue 3131.  We hope to see you again in he future.

name: anna sims
text: Quaint, cozy, and quite breathtaking. Wonderful amenities.

resp.text:
Thanks Anna, we loved having you all out for  Zack and Lulu's wedding it was PERFECT!
Thanks you,
Chris and Holly
VENUE 31|31

name: Percy Lewis
text: Awesome people Awesome place

name: Damon Hall
text: Clean and professional.

name: Brian Reaves
text: This is an incredibly beautiful venue capable of just about any wedding scenario. Their outdoor area is like something out of a movie with the vines covering it, and their indoor area is spacious and clean. They even have the perfect spot for the reception right there on the grounds with rolling doors to allow for indoor or outdoor receptions. The owners are incredibly nice people who really want to make the event special.

name: ALLAN BARNETT
text: Nice facility inside and out

name: Jim Weaver
text:
Service is terrible, receptionist may or may not be around to let you in your room.  Billing is a mess and trying to cancel is nearly impossible.  I have asked local manager to cancel two weeks ago, then I got billed for January this week, when I called she said "oh yeah you need to do that on the website."

In response to your reply............we contacted customer service 5 days ago and NO RESPONSE!  How about a number of email address of a human that can actually do something about this?

resp.text: I'm sorry if there've been any charges made in error. For any fees that are not stated in your contract, we'd be happy to help resolve these. Please send us your company reference number and we'll ask Customer Service to contact you. Thank you.

name: Eric andrews
text:
The worst service I have ever received from any business.They Lied to us and cost us thousands of dollars. We ended up homeless. The york county south Carolina office is absolutely terrible.  We tried to buy a house using a V.A. loan we were lied to about pre approval for over a month. We broke the lease on our apartment and packed up all our belongings. The day of closing they called us and said they couldn't approve us till September. My wife is a disabled veteran and now 4 months pregnant. Because of the incompetence and blatant dishonesty of mortgage right we were homeless for the 4rth of July. We recently found out from our new loan company that (M.R) never even started the V.A. application process. They knew from day 1 that they wouldn't approve us but still lied to us for a whole month taking our appraisal, and Ernest money. The treatment we received was out right despicable the agents at their South Carolina office. Made us loose a substantial amount of money 1000.00 for the U-haul alone. They will be hearing from our attorney about that.
We will be reporting them to the B.B.B and we are currently in the process of getting this company black listed from the V.A. So no other service members are subjected to these kind of scumbagg business practices..
We are also contacting every news outlet in the following counties. York,lancaster,Chesterfield and Mecklenburg.
Loan company takes advantage of 22 yo pregnant veteran resulting in homelessness on the 4rth of July...what a headline..

resp.text: Thank you for your review, Eric. Although it sounds like this may not be about Regus office spaces? If this based on one of the companies that uses Regus, please speak to them directly.

name: December Sixx
text: Very nice place.  I had to visit my insurance agent there.

name: Tiffany Perz
text: Nice people

resp.text: Thank you for the 5 star review!

name: wendy roberts
text: Ask for Shelley. She is a fantastic manager.

name: Aaron Gregory
text: Great meeting location, helpful staff

name: Jonathan Barbee
text: Great services and nice staff.

name: Brandy Olander
text: Great office space.  Kristine is wonderful!

name: Rashid Swanson
text: My girlfriend has her office for her non emergency medical transport company here called Angena healthcare services,  and I work here with a billboard company called smart safe systems, and they have miscommunications between corporate and the local branches sometimes, but other than that everything is perfect.

name: Kristine Jones
text: I love having my office with Regus! It is clean, professional, and friendly. My clients love the building and interacting with the staff. I am proud to tell people in the community I am in a Regus space in one of the most beautiful buildings in downtown Montgomery. As a new business owner, I am happy I made the choice of starting my business in a Regus office!

name: Frank Truncali
text: My experience so far with Regus has been great.  The staff is great and I love the building.  It's a good value for office space in downtown Montgomery.

name: Cheryl Phillips
text: The staff is simply amazing and helpful! Definitely a great place to have your office located in. The decor is very nice, clean, and modern. You will feel like a 5star business and your customers will too.

name: Jeffrey Prescott
text: So I went to look at a new office space for my work and I was nervous and new and amiee and Mallory were awesome in helping me pick the right plan for me I got a space and I love it  keep up the great work guys

name: JAMM Resources LLC
text: Regus is wonderful! Nice office space, amenities, & staff. I’m so glad I found an all in one office space!

name: Ms Always Classy.
text: This is a very secured, beautiful building. From the time you walk in, until the time that you leave, you feel a sense of security.

name: Clarissa Harris
text: Beautiful Place! !

name: Marcus Jones
text: Very friendly staff!

name: Don Johnson
text: another RSA state owned office complex.

name: Shatia Miller
text: Amazing staff.

name: Michael Hamilton
text: It looks good and they have different offices.

name: Gary Cartee
text: Great food

name: Thearse Dollar
text: I like the people who works there. Any time I need help or have questions they always seem happy to help me out and answer any questions. When I had my wreak, this office was my life line.

name: ACE MANAGEMENT
text: Ideal office space.  Good location and well kept by owner.

name: Lori Stolz
text: The people were nice and very helpful... Clean functional environment!!!

name: Chief YongMayniak
text: Higher frequency elite ale

name: Tammy Mills Shaughnessy
text: I really love the new manicured overall look and feel of the well lit property.  It definetly reads professional businesses are here at Workplace.

name: MomiJuana Brat
text: Convenient...on the bus route❤🖤💚

name: defabricational a last name
text: Small offices affordable to any fledgling business. Accommodations abound. High security. Well worth your startup dollars.

name: julie khadka
text: We have a small office here and we love it!  The staff is always very helpful!

name: roy keller
text: Great place to run a small business.

name: Sylvia Sutton
text: Job interview...❤🖤💚

name: Jon Vaughn
text: Very sweet girl that helped us demo the device.  Great experience.

name: BamaLen G.
text: Friendly people

name: Suanne Nutter
text: Beautiful office space

name: christa lodico
text: Nice people

name: Mark Branson
text: I have been a customer for several years. They have recently let go of everyone that used to run this location. Service has disappeared, communication has also vanished. Despite not adhering to the level of professionalism and service promised, they are refusing to let me out of a contract that was subsequently inflated without explanation. Please avoid at all costs!

resp.text: Hello Mark. I'm sorry to hear this. Please can you email customer.service@regus.com with your account number, along with details of your experience. A member of the Customer Service team will be in touch with you shortly. Thank you.

name: Gary
text: Nice, quiet place to do business. Easy to get too / convenient location.

name: dingo Rex
text: Great place

name: rebecca anderson
text: Fantastic company

name: David Thomas
text: Clean, attractive, well run location. Very accommodating.

name: Carl Holden
text: Best offices in Huntsville. Amazing staff!

name: Bryan Haviland
text: Nice facility. Very quiet, ghost town feel.

name: Chris Hardy
text: Quaint little place, friendly staff, but  facilities look a bit outdated.

resp.text: You are correct, Mr. Hardy. The facility is a bit outdated in decor but we are a very pleasant working environment.  Our tenants love it here and our onsite management is very helpful.

name: T. Barnes
text: Wide variety of tenants.

resp.text: Mr. Barnes, sorry for the delay responding to your rating. Yes, we have quite a variety of businesses.
